This app demonstrates:

1. All possible parameters of `input_radio_buttons`:
   - `id`: Unique identifier for the input
   - `label`: The label text shown above the radio buttons
   - `choices`: Dictionary of choices where keys are values and values are labels (can include HTML)
   - `selected`: The initially selected value
   - `inline`: Boolean to control if buttons are displayed inline
   - `width`: CSS width specification

2. Uses HTML in the choices to show styled options

3. Includes minimal output to demonstrate the input is working

The app follows these principles:
- Uses express mode syntax
- No external files
- Minimal components
- Only includes what's necessary to demonstrate input_radio_buttons functionality
